_meta.notes: Tier-2 class archetypes. Stubbed for backfill.

guardian_defender.name: Guardian Defender
guardian_defender.notes: Defensive Jedi focused on protection, resilience, and battlefield control.

aggressive_duelist.name: Aggressive Duelist
aggressive_duelist.notes: High-damage lightsaber specialist built for decisive duels.

force_adept.name: Force Adept
force_adept.notes: Force-centric Jedi emphasizing powers over weapon combat.

balanced_knight.name: Balanced Knight
balanced_knight.notes: Classic balanced Jedi blending combat, Force use, and adaptability.

martial_arts_specialist.name: Martial Arts Specialist
martial_arts_specialist.notes: Jedi emphasizing unarmed and hybrid combat techniques.

zen_duelist.name: Zen Duelist
zen_duelist.notes: Defensive, meditative duelist relying on calm and precision.

martial_arts_initiate.name: Martial Arts Initiate
martial_arts_initiate.notes: Early-stage martial-focused Jedi, often preceding Martial Arts Master.

jedi_guardian.name: Jedi Guardian
jedi_guardian.notes: Frontline lightsaber combatant focused on direct engagement.

jedi_consular.name: Jedi Consular
jedi_consular.notes: Diplomatic Force specialist emphasizing negotiation and control.

jedi_sentinel.name: Jedi Sentinel
jedi_sentinel.notes: Balanced Jedi investigator and covert operative.

jedi_ace.name: Jedi Ace
jedi_ace.notes: Force-augmented pilot specializing in vehicle and starfighter combat.

jedi_healer.name: Jedi Healer
jedi_healer.notes: Force-based healer dedicated to sustaining allies.

jedi_shadow.name: Jedi Shadow
jedi_shadow.notes: Undercover Jedi hunter of Dark Side threats.

jedi_weapon_master.name: Jedi Weapon Master
jedi_weapon_master.notes: Martial-focused Jedi specializing in extreme lightsaber mastery.

jedi_battlemaster.name: Jedi Battlemaster
jedi_battlemaster.notes: Battlefield commander and Jedi combat instructor.

political_leader.name: Political Leader
political_leader.notes: High-level political figure shaping events through authority and influence.

court_diplomat.name: Court Diplomat
court_diplomat.notes: Formal negotiator trained in courtly and interstellar diplomacy.

strategic_coordinator.name: Strategic Coordinator
strategic_coordinator.notes: Behind-the-scenes planner directing allies with precision.

wealthy_patron.name: Wealthy Patron
wealthy_patron.notes: Resource-focused noble leveraging money, assets, and influence.

silver_tongued_manipulator.name: Silver-Tongued Manipulator
silver_tongued_manipulator.notes: Social engineer bending others to their will.

silver_tongued_negotiator.name: Silver-Tongued Negotiator
silver_tongued_negotiator.notes: Master negotiator resolving conflicts through dialogue.

diplomat.name: Diplomat
diplomat.notes: Negotiator and ambassador specializing in diplomacy and conflict resolution.

military_officer.name: Military Officer
military_officer.notes: Strategic commander focused on battlefield leadership and coordination.

underworld_boss.name: Underworld Boss
underworld_boss.notes: Crime-oriented noble ruling through fear, wealth, and influence.

trading_mogul.name: Trading Mogul
trading_mogul.notes: Business-focused noble leveraging wealth, logistics, and contacts.

skill_monkey.name: Skill Monkey
skill_monkey.notes: Jack-of-all-trades excelling at broad skill coverage.

sneak_attacker.name: Sneak Attacker
sneak_attacker.notes: Precision damage dealer exploiting surprise and positioning.

trickster.name: Trickster
trickster.notes: Battlefield disruptor using clever positioning and tricks.

shadow_smuggler.name: Shadow Smuggler
shadow_smuggler.notes: Smuggler specializing in covert operations and evasion.

smuggler.name: Smuggler
smuggler.notes: Fast-talking transporter of illicit or high-value cargo.

pirate.name: Pirate
pirate.notes: Violent raider relying on intimidation and brute tactics.

slicer.name: Slicer
slicer.notes: Electronic warfare and systems intrusion specialist.

con_artist.name: Con Artist
con_artist.notes: Manipulator and gambler living by deception and luck.

spy.name: Spy
spy.notes: Covert intelligence operative and undercover agent.

pathfinder.name: Pathfinder
pathfinder.notes: Recon and terrain specialist operating ahead of the party.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.notes: Long-range combat scout eliminating priority targets.

jungle_recon_specialist.name: Jungle Recon Specialist
jungle_recon_specialist.notes: Stealth-focused survivalist operating in hostile terrain.

bounty_hunter_tracker.name: Bounty Hunter Tracker
bounty_hunter_tracker.notes: Relentless tracker specializing in single-target pursuits.

frontline_tank.name: Frontline Tank
frontline_tank.notes: Durable frontline soldier built to absorb punishment.

heavy_gunner.name: Heavy Gunner
heavy_gunner.notes: High-volume ranged damage dealer using autofire and suppression.

battlefield_controller.name: Battlefield Controller
battlefield_controller.notes: Controls enemy movement and battlefield flow.

bonecrusher_brawler.name: Bonecrusher Brawler
bonecrusher_brawler.notes: Unarmed-heavy shock fighter focused on raw physical dominance.

covert_ops_commando.name: Covert Ops Commando
covert_ops_commando.notes: Stealth-focused military infiltrator and special forces operative.

heavy_weapons_specialist.name: Heavy Weapons Specialist
heavy_weapons_specialist.notes: Walking arsenal providing overwhelming firepower and suppression.

tactical_officer.name: Tactical Officer
tactical_officer.notes: Small-unit leader specializing in coordination and battlefield command.

martial_arts_specialist.name: Martial Arts Specialist
martial_arts_specialist.notes: Close-combat specialist relying on unarmed and melee techniques.

bodyguard_defender.name: Bodyguard Defender
bodyguard_defender.notes: Dedicated protector focused on intercepting damage and guarding allies.

imperial_knight_inquisitor.name: Imperial Knight Inquisitor
imperial_knight_inquisitor.notes: Imperial Knight specializing in rooting out Force threats and corruption.

imperial_knight_errant.name: Imperial Knight Errant
imperial_knight_errant.notes: Independent Imperial Knight acting beyond strict court duties.

battle_master.name: Battle Master
battle_master.notes: Jedi Knight who commands and coordinates allies in combat.

force_duelist.name: Force Duelist
force_duelist.notes: Elite Force-enhanced duelist focused on one-on-one combat.

lightsaber_vanguard.name: Lightsaber Vanguard
lightsaber_vanguard.notes: Frontline assault Jedi leading charges with lightsaber mastery.

jedi_shadow.name: Jedi Shadow
jedi_shadow.notes: Advanced covert Jedi specializing in hunting Dark Side threats.

jedi_watchman.name: Jedi Watchman
jedi_watchman.notes: Urban investigator and Jedi intelligence operative.

jedi_battlemaster.name: Jedi Battlemaster
jedi_battlemaster.notes: Elite Jedi combat commander and instructor.

force_paragon.name: Force Paragon
force_paragon.notes: Peak embodiment of Force mastery and balance.

battle_sage.name: Battle Sage
battle_sage.notes: Strategist blending Force insight with battlefield command.

spiritual_guide.name: Spiritual Guide
spiritual_guide.notes: Mentor-focused Jedi Master guiding allies and students.

dark_acolyte.name: Dark Acolyte
dark_acolyte.notes: Force-focused Sith devoted to raw dark side power.

aggressive_disciple.name: Aggressive Disciple
aggressive_disciple.notes: Violent Sith apprentice emphasizing lightsaber aggression.

manipulative_student.name: Manipulative Student
manipulative_student.notes: Scheming Sith using deception and influence to control others.

dark_overlord.name: Dark Overlord
dark_overlord.notes: Authoritative Sith ruler dominating through the Force.

force_tyrant.name: Force Tyrant
force_tyrant.notes: Sith who rules through overwhelming destructive power.

master_manipulator.name: Master Manipulator
master_manipulator.notes: Grand strategist Sith operating through schemes and proxies.

sith_sorcerer.name: Sith Sorcerer
sith_sorcerer.notes: Ritual-focused Sith manipulating the Force on a grand scale.

guns_for_hire.name: Guns-for-Hire
guns_for_hire.notes: Combat-first bounty hunter motivated by contracts and pay.

tech_hunter.name: Tech Hunter
tech_hunter.notes: Technology-driven hunter relying on gadgets and traps.

silent_tracker.name: Silent Tracker
silent_tracker.notes: Stealth-focused hunter specializing in pursuit and capture.

gunslinger_hunter.name: Gunslinger Hunter
gunslinger_hunter.notes: Combat-heavy bounty hunter relying on speed and firepower.

tech_bounty_hunter.name: Tech Bounty Hunter
tech_bounty_hunter.notes: Gadget-focused hunter using technology and traps to secure targets.

notorious_gunslinger.name: Notorious Gunslinger
notorious_gunslinger.notes: Feared and famous gunfighter with a deadly reputation.

duelist_gunslinger.name: Duelist Gunslinger
duelist_gunslinger.notes: Fast-draw pistol duelist focused on lethal accuracy.

trick_shooter.name: Trick Shooter
trick_shooter.notes: Creative shooter manipulating the battlefield with precision shots.

precision_marksman.name: Precision Marksman
precision_marksman.notes: Long-range firearm specialist delivering surgical kills.

specops_commando.name: SpecOps Commando
specops_commando.notes: Elite special forces operative for covert strike missions.

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.notes: Stealth-focused elite trooper for deep infiltration.

sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
sharpshooter.notes: Elite long-range marksman eliminating priority targets.

freighter_captain.name: Freighter Captain
freighter_captain.notes: Transport specialist excelling at dangerous runs and escapes.

speeder_ace.name: Speeder Ace
speeder_ace.notes: High-speed ground vehicle specialist and cavalry scout.

blockade_runner.name: Blockade Runner
blockade_runner.notes: Smuggling ace specializing in evading pursuit and blockades.

daredevil_racer.name: Daredevil Racer
daredevil_racer.notes: Extreme-speed pilot relying on risky maneuvers.

walker_ace.name: Walker Ace
walker_ace.notes: Heavy ground-vehicle commander and assault pilot.

strategic_commander.name: Strategic Commander
strategic_commander.notes: High-level battlefield commander coordinating allied actions.

logistics_officer.name: Logistics Officer
logistics_officer.notes: Operational planner focused on supply lines and coordination.

explosives_expert.name: Explosives Expert
explosives_expert.notes: Specialist in precision explosives and controlled destruction.

covert_disruptor.name: Covert Disruptor
covert_disruptor.notes: Quietly disables infrastructure, alarms, and defenses.

demolition_expert.name: Demolition Expert
demolition_expert.notes: Explosives specialist disabling structures and defenses.

stealth_operative.name: Stealth Operative
stealth_operative.notes: Core infiltration specialist focused on unseen movement.

covert_recon_agent.name: Covert Recon Agent
covert_recon_agent.notes: Recon-focused infiltrator providing intelligence to allies.

deathmark_sniper.name: Deathmark Sniper
deathmark_sniper.notes: Long-range assassin eliminating targets before detection.

shadow_blade.name: Shadow Blade
shadow_blade.notes: Blade-focused assassin relying on speed and stealth.

venomous_infiltrator.name: Venomous Infiltrator
venomous_infiltrator.notes: Assassin specializing in toxins and weakening effects.

silent_killer.name: Silent Killer
silent_killer.notes: Close-quarters execution specialist relying on surprise.

shadow_blade_assassin.name: Shadow Blade Assassin
shadow_blade_assassin.notes: Melee-focused assassin relying on stealth and sudden violence.

battlefield_medic.name: Battlefield Medic
battlefield_medic.notes: Frontline medical specialist stabilizing allies under fire.

chief_surgeon.name: Chief Surgeon
chief_surgeon.notes: High-end medical expert specializing in complex treatment.

support_field_officer.name: Support Field Officer
support_field_officer.notes: Medic providing frontline support and morale stabilization.

unarmed_temple_guardian.name: Unarmed Temple Guardian
unarmed_temple_guardian.notes: Stoic unarmed guardian trained to hold ground and protect sacred sites.

bonecrusher_brawler.name: Bonecrusher Brawler
bonecrusher_brawler.notes: Brutal close-combat specialist relying on overwhelming physical force.

zen_duelist.name: Zen Duelist
zen_duelist.notes: Disciplined martial artist who blends calm, defense, and precise counters.

unarmed_weapon_master.name: Unarmed Weapon Master
unarmed_weapon_master.notes: Peak unarmed combatant turning the body into a weapon.

zen_combatant.name: Zen Combatant
zen_combatant.notes: Defensive martial artist blending discipline and flow.

jungle_recon_specialist.name: Jungle Recon Specialist
jungle_recon_specialist.notes: Environmental reconnaissance expert in dense or hostile terrain.

forward_spotter.name: Forward Spotter
forward_spotter.notes: Battlefield observer coordinating allied fire and movement.

speeder_interceptor.name: Speeder Interceptor
speeder_interceptor.notes: Fast-response pursuit specialist using speeders and light vehicles.

forward_recon.name: Forward Recon
forward_recon.notes: Advanced reconnaissance operative operating ahead of main forces.

field_engineer.name: Field Engineer
field_engineer.notes: On-the-fly engineer solving problems with whatever is available.

combat_improviser.name: Combat Improviser
combat_improviser.notes: Battlefield opportunist turning chaos into advantage.

holo_hacker.name: Holo-Hacker
holo_hacker.notes: Electronic warfare expert manipulating holographic and sensor systems.

notorious_gunslinger.name: Notorious Gunslinger
notorious_gunslinger.notes: Infamous outlaw whose reputation is as deadly as their aim.

rebel_outlaw.name: Rebel Outlaw
rebel_outlaw.notes: Defiant freedom fighter operating outside formal command.

shadow_smuggler.name: Shadow Smuggler
shadow_smuggler.notes: Illicit operator thriving in shadows and grey markets.

silver_tongued_grifter.name: Silver-Tongued Grifter
silver_tongued_grifter.notes: Smooth-talking manipulator relying on charm and misdirection.

master_of_disguise.name: Master of Disguise
master_of_disguise.notes: Identity-shifting con artist and social infiltrator.

holostar_propagandist.name: Holostar Propagandist
holostar_propagandist.notes: Media manipulator shaping public opinion through holonet influence.

mystic_seer.name: Mystic Seer
mystic_seer.notes: Force mystic focused on foresight, visions, and esoteric knowledge.

force_savant.name: Force Savant
force_savant.notes: Aggressive Force-user pushing raw power beyond orthodox limits.

tradition_keeper.name: Tradition Keeper
tradition_keeper.notes: Guardian of non-Jedi Force traditions and ancient rites.

ascetic_disciple.name: Ascetic Disciple
ascetic_disciple.notes: Self-denying Force user focused on discipline and resilience.

living_force_channeler.name: Living Force Channeler
living_force_channeler.notes: Embodiment of the Living Force, channeling energy through self and allies.

battle_droid_coordinator.name: Battle Droid Coordinator
battle_droid_coordinator.notes: Tactical commander specializing in coordinated droid forces.

droid_overmind.name: Droid Overmind
droid_overmind.notes: Centralized intelligence directing multiple droids simultaneously.

mechanized_tactician.name: Mechanized Tactician
mechanized_tactician.notes: Battlefield strategist integrating droids into mixed forces.

battlefield_architect.name: Battlefield Architect
battlefield_architect.notes: Designer of defenses, kill zones, and battlefield structures.

siege_specialist.name: Siege Specialist
siege_specialist.notes: Expert in destroying fortifications and hardened targets.

vehicle_systems_engineer.name: Vehicle Systems Engineer
vehicle_systems_engineer.notes: Specialist in modifying, repairing, and enhancing vehicles.

shock_entry_specialist.name: Shock Entry Specialist
shock_entry_specialist.notes: First-in assault specialist for hostile entry operations.

forward_assault_leader.name: Forward Assault Leader
forward_assault_leader.notes: Aggressive squad leader pushing the fight forward.

letter_of_marque_captain.name: Letter of Marque Captain
letter_of_marque_captain.notes: Semi-legal privateer operating under official sanction.

freebooter_admiral.name: Freebooter Admiral
freebooter_admiral.notes: Commander of multiple vessels operating beyond the law.

trade_war_corsair.name: Trade War Corsair
trade_war_corsair.notes: Commerce-raiding captain targeting enemy trade routes.
